thread.title: Samira Wiley & Lauren Morelli Are Married!
thread.title_full: Samira Wiley & Lauren Morelli Are Married!

author: Just Jared
title: Samira Wiley & Lauren Morelli Are Married!
text:
Samira Wiley has married longtime love Lauren Morelli !
The 29-year-old former Orange is the New Black star and her writer love tied the knot in a intimate ceremony on Saturday afternoon (March 25) in Palm Springs, Calif.
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Samira Wiley 
According to Martha Stewart Weddings , the couple were surrounded by friends and family at their wedding, where Samira â€˜s parents officiated the ceremony.
Samira and Lauren announced their engagement in October 2016.
Congrats to the happy couple!
